api.title: API
api.description: The FOSSASIA Community API version you use

metacommunity.title: Metacommunity
metacommunity.description: The name of your meta community. if you local community belongs to a bigger community

location.title: Location
location.description: Position data such as a postal address or geographic coordinates

city.title: City
city.description: name of your city or region

country.title: Country
country.description: Your country, list taken from http://countrylist.net/de/

address.description: The address of the place you meet

Name.title: Name of your place
Name.description: the name of place you meet

Zipcode.title: ZIP
Zipcode.description: the zip code of your meeting place

lat.title: Latitude
lat.description: Latitude of your city in decimal degrees (e.g. 51.12345)

lon.title: Longitude
lon.description: Longitude of your city in decimal degrees (e.g. 11.6789)

email.title: Email
email.description: Email address to which other people can contact your community (user@domain.com)

facebook.title: facebook
facebook.description: URL to your community's facebook account (https://facebook.com/...)

identica.title: Identica
identica.description: URL to your community's identica account (https://identi.ca/...)

irc.title: IRC
irc.description: your community's irc channel, starts with irc://

ml.title: Mailinglist
ml.description: The email address (user@domain.com) of your mailing list or a link to the mailinglist info page (http{s}://...)

phone.title: Phone
phone.description: if your community has a phone number (e.g. +49 1234 567890 based on E.123 notation)

googleplus.title: Google+
googleplus.description: URL to your community's g+ account (https://plus.google.com/...)

webform.title: Webform
webform.description: URL to your community's contact form (http{s}://...)

timeline.description: These are lifetime events something like date of birth (and rebirth :-) of your community or other important milestones

timestamp.title: Timestamp
timestamp.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the event happened (format yyyy-mm-dd)

url.title: URL
url.description: url to details of this timeline-element

category.title: Feed category
category.description: category of the feed like blog entries, calendars, forum messages, wiki articles, ...

type.title: Feed type
type.description: type of the feed like rss, atom, xml

state.description: A collection of status-related data. Actual open/closed status, icons, last change timestamp etc.

lastchange.title: Last Change
lastchange.description: At what iso timestamp has your community status lastly changed? (ISO 8601 timestamp)

message.title: Message
message.description: A free-form string something like 'open for public', 'members only' or whatever you want it to be)

description.title: Description
description.description: Describe your community in a few lines

logo.title: Logo
logo.description: URL to the logo of your community, formats: jpg, png, size: square, 150x150, 300x300
